description: Contains order specimen type modifier data.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPEC_TYPE_MOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Modifiers associated with the order specimen type


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SPEC_TYPE_MOD_SNOCD
columns.description: SNOMED codes associated with specimen modifiers

columns.name: SPEC_TYPE_MOD_SNO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Details whether the associated SNOMED code was Reported discretely or Inferred 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Reported


Inferred
